description: Brand design standards and guidelines for One A Day (OAD) products and marketing materials

restrictions: Do not use fonts other than Helvetica Neue or approved fallbacks
Do not use font weights other than 400, 500, or 700
Maintain specified line-height ratios for readability

logoUsage.clearSpaceDescription: Minimum 20px clear space on all sides of the logo. Clear space equals the height of the 'O' in 'One'.

versions.primary: Full color on white or light backgrounds
versions.white: White logo on dark backgrounds (#333333 or darker)

prohibitions: Do not stretch or distort the logo proportions
Do not rotate the logo at any angle
Do not add effects, shadows, or gradients to the logo
Do not place logo on busy or patterned backgrounds
Do not change logo colors or use unapproved color variations
Do not separate logo elements or rearrange components
Do not use outdated or unofficial logo versions

positioning.alignment: Align to grid/margin, not arbitrary positioning

accessibility.minContrastRatioDescription: WCAG AA standard for normal text. Use 3:1 for large text (18px+ or 14px+ bold)
accessibility.minFontSizeDescription: Minimum font size for body text. Smaller text (12px) allowed only for legal disclaimers.
accessibility.colorBlindnessConsiderations: Do not rely on color alone to convey information. Use icons, patterns, or text labels.
accessibility.altTextGuidelines: Provide descriptive alt text for all images. Describe content and function, not appearance.

designPrinciples.simplicity: Keep designs clean and uncluttered. Focus on clear messaging.
designPrinciples.consistency: Maintain visual consistency across all brand touchpoints.
designPrinciples.hierarchy: Establish clear visual hierarchy with typography and spacing.
designPrinciples.whitespace: Use generous whitespace to improve readability and focus.

imagery.subjects: Real people, families, active lifestyles, health and wellness
avoid: Images that feel staged or inauthentic

treatments.preferredFilters: Natural, warm tones with good contrast
treatments.avoid: Heavy filters, over-saturation, black and white

iconography.style: Simple, line-based icons with rounded corners

guidelines: Logo must be visible and meet minimum size requirements
Text must be legible at thumbnail size
Ensure safe zones for platform overlays (profile pictures, UI elements)
File size under 150KB for web performance
Provide both RGB and CMYK versions of logo

disclaimers.required: Supplement facts, health claims, FDA disclaimers as applicable

legalRequirements.copyrightNotice: © 2026 Bayer Consumer Health. All rights reserved.
legalRequirements.trademarkSymbol: Use ® for registered trademarks on first mention

approvalProcess.timeline: Allow 3-5 business days for brand review
approvalProcess.documentation: Submit design brief, rationale, and usage context with all submissions

changeLog.changes: Initial brand standards document created for AI-powered compliance system
